Sports and Clubs: Member, Nizam Club and Country Club (Hyderabad)
Social And Cultural Activities: (i) As a social worker, spread awareness is being created against child marriages; and (ii) Keen follower of music and traditional dances like Kuchipuddi and Bharatanatayam, etc.
Favourite Pastime and Recreation: (i) Reading of newspapers and political magazines; (ii) Watching T.V. like Discovery Channel, which covers animal life and history channel; and (iii) Visiting tourism spots and heritage structure.
Literary Artistic & Scientific Accomplis: Field experiments were conducted on usage of Drip Irrigation on sugarcane and found around 30% increase of quality yield in sugarcane.
Special Interests: (i) Likes touring to the places of historic importance and heritage structures; and (ii) interested in educational tours to acquire innovative techniques.
Educational Qualifications: B.Sc. (Agriculture) Educated at Marathwada Agricultural University Parbhani,Maharashtra
Other Information: (i) Hails from a popular freedom fighters family from Narayankhed of Distt. Medak, A.P.; (ii) My late grand father Sri Apparao Shetkar, a famous freedom fighter elected twice to A.P. Legislative Assembly from Narayankhed Assembly Segment; (iii) My father late Shri Shivrao Shetkar another popular freedom fighter and eminent advocate got elected thrice as MLA from same segment as IInd generation and it is privileged that I have been elected as IIIrd generation M.L.A. in the year 2004 from the same segment; (iv) Served Medak Distt. Youth Congress President from 1991-1998; (v) Also served as President Medak Distt. Congress Committee from 2002-2008; and (vi) Member, Board of Management to A.N.G.R.A.U. from 2006 till date.
